TEXT.English: Display popup on initialization indicating what components are active
TEXT.French: Display popup on initialization indicating what components are active
TEXT.German: Bei der Initialisierung öffnet sich ein Fenster, das anzeigt, welche Komponenten aktiv sind
TEXT.Italian: Display popup on initialization indicating what components are active
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra un popup en la inicialización indicando que componentes hay activos.
TEXT.Finnish: Display popup on initialization indicating what components are active

TEXT.English: Turn on Barbarian Civ Debug output
TEXT.French: Turn on Barbarian Civ Debug output
TEXT.German: Schaltet die Barbarian Civ Debug-Ausgabe ein
TEXT.Italian: Turn on Barbarian Civ Debug output
TEXT.Spanish: Activa la salida de depuración del mod Barbarian Civ.
TEXT.Finnish: Turn on Barbarian Civ Debug output

TEXT.English: Enables announcment when Barbarian cities settle down and spawn new civs
TEXT.French: Enables announcment when Barbarian cities settle down and spawn new civs
TEXT.German: Kündigt an, wenn sich Barbarenstädte ansiedeln und neue Zivilisationen gegründet werden
TEXT.Italian: Enables announcment when Barbarian cities settle down and spawn new civs
TEXT.Spanish: Activa el anuncio cuando una ciudad bárbara se asienta y forma una nueva civilización.
TEXT.Finnish: Enables announcment when Barbarian cities settle down and spawn new civs

TEXT.English: Use a popup when announcing barbarian city settleing
TEXT.French: Use a popup when announcing barbarian city settleing
TEXT.German: Bei der Ankündigung von sich ansiedelnden Barbaren öffnet sich ein Fenster
TEXT.Italian: Use a popup when announcing barbarian city settleing
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra un popup anunciando que una ciudad bárbara se asienta y forma una nueva civilización.
TEXT.Finnish: Use a popup when announcing barbarian city settleing

TEXT.English: Only nearby players are notified when barbarian cities settle
TEXT.French: Only nearby players are notified when barbarian cities settle
TEXT.German: Nur Spieler, die sich in der Nähe befinden, werden von der Gründung von Barbarenstädten benachrichtigt
TEXT.Italian: Only nearby players are notified when barbarian cities settle
TEXT.Spanish: Solo los jugadores cercanos son notificados cuando una ciudad bárbara se asienta.
TEXT.Finnish: Only nearby players are notified when barbarian cities settle

TEXT.English: Lock barb settle popup while AIAutoPlay is on (will show up as messages)
TEXT.French: Lock barb settle popup while AIAutoPlay is on (will show up as messages)
TEXT.German: Blockiert das Öffnen von Fenstern zur Ansiedlung von Barbaren, wenn AIAutoPlay läuft (wird als Textmeldung angezeigt)
TEXT.Italian: Lock barb settle popup while AIAutoPlay is on (will show up as messages)
TEXT.Spanish: Bloquea el popup de asentamiento bárbaro cuando AIAutoPlay esta activado (solo se mostrara el mensaje)
TEXT.Finnish: Lock barb settle popup while AIAutoPlay is on (will show up as messages)

TEXT.English: Sets New World policy on Barbarian civ settling in new world landmasses[NEWLINE]0: New World treated like Old World[NEWLINE]1: New World barb civs spawn as normal, but chance to settle into a full civ from a minor is reduced[NEWLINE]2: New World barbarian civs stay minors until contact is made with an old world civ[NEWLINE]3: Like 2, but New World barb civs cannot settle until an Old World unit lands on the landmass[NEWLINE]4: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ unit lands on landmass[NEWLINE]5: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ settles a city on the landmass
TEXT.French: Sets New World policy on Barbarian civ settling in new world landmasses[NEWLINE]0: New World treated like Old World[NEWLINE]1: New World barb civs spawn as normal, but chance to settle into a full civ from a minor is reduced[NEWLINE]2: New World barbarian civs stay minors until contact is made with an old world civ[NEWLINE]3: Like 2, but New World barb civs cannot settle until an Old World unit lands on the landmass[NEWLINE]4: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ unit lands on landmass[NEWLINE]5: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ settles a city on the landmass
TEXT.German: Regelt die Ansiedlung von Barbarensiedlungen auf Kontinenten der Neuen Welt[NEWLINE]0: Die Neue Welt wird wie die Alte Welt behandelt[NEWLINE]1: Normale Verbreitung von Barbaren-Zivilisationen in der Neuen Welt, aber die Wahrscheinlichkeit der Entstehung einer vollen Zivilisation aus einer kleinen Zivilisation ist reduziert[NEWLINE]2: Die Barbaren-Zivilisationen der Neuen Welt bleiben klein, bis sie Kontakt mir einer Zivilisation der Alten Welt gemacht haben[NEWLINE]3: Wie 2, aber Barbaren-Zivilisationen der Neuen Welt können sich erst weiterentwickeln, wenn eine Einheit der Alten Welt ihren Kontinent betreten hat[NEWLINE]4: Barbaren-Zivilisationen entstehen erst, wenn eine Einheit der Alten Welt den Kontinent betreten hat[NEWLINE]5: Barbaren-Zivilisationen entstehen erst, wenn eine Zivilisation der Alten Welt eine Stadt auf dem Kontinent gegründet hat
TEXT.Italian: Sets New World policy on Barbarian civ settling in new world landmasses[NEWLINE]0: New World treated like Old World[NEWLINE]1: New World barb civs spawn as normal, but chance to settle into a full civ from a minor is reduced[NEWLINE]2: New World barbarian civs stay minors until contact is made with an old world civ[NEWLINE]3: Like 2, but New World barb civs cannot settle until an Old World unit lands on the landmass[NEWLINE]4: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ unit lands on landmass[NEWLINE]5: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ settles a city on the landmass
TEXT.Spanish: Establece la Política de Nuevo Mundo sobre las civilizaciones bárbaras asentándose en territorios 'Nuevo Mundo'[NEWLINE]0: Nuevo Mundo tratado como Viejo Mundo[NEWLINE]1: Las civilizaciones bárbaras del Nuevo Mundo aparecen normalmente, pero la probabilidad de crecer a una civilización completa es reducida[NEWLINE]2: Las civilizaciones bárbaras del Nuevo Mundo permanecen como civilizaciones menores hasta el contacto con las civilizaciones del Viejo Mundo[NEWLINE]3: Como el punto 2, pero las civilizaciones bárbaras del Nuevo Mundo no pueden pasar de menores hasta que una unidad del Viejo Mundo pisa la tierra[NEWLINE]4: Las civilizaciones bárbaras del Nuevo Mundo no crecerán a civilización menor hasta que una unidad del Viejo Mundo pisa la tierra[NEWLINE]5: Las civilizaciones bárbaras del Nuevo Mundo no crecerán a civilización menor hasta que una civilización del Viejo Mundo funda una ciudad en el territorio
TEXT.Finnish: Sets New World policy on Barbarian civ settling in new world landmasses[NEWLINE]0: New World treated like Old World[NEWLINE]1: New World barb civs spawn as normal, but chance to settle into a full civ from a minor is reduced[NEWLINE]2: New World barbarian civs stay minors until contact is made with an old world civ[NEWLINE]3: Like 2, but New World barb civs cannot settle until an Old World unit lands on the landmass[NEWLINE]4: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ unit lands on landmass[NEWLINE]5: Barb civs will not spawn until an old world civ settles a city on the landmass

TEXT.English: Average number of turns a new world minor civ remains a minor after the conditions under NewWorldPolicies 2 and higher are satisfied
TEXT.French: Average number of turns a new world minor civ remains a minor after the conditions under NewWorldPolicies 2 and higher are satisfied
TEXT.German: Durchschnittliche Rundenzahl, die eine kleine Barbaren-Zivilisation in der Neuen Welt benötigt, bis sie nach Erfüllung der Anforderungen der Neue-Welt-Regeln 2 bis 5 zu einer großen Zivilisation wächst.
TEXT.Italian: Average number of turns a new world minor civ remains a minor after the conditions under NewWorldPolicies 2 and higher are satisfied
TEXT.Spanish: Numero de turnos medio en que una civilización menor permanece menor después de que las condiciones de Política de Nuevo Mundo 2 y superiores se han cumplido
TEXT.Finnish: Average number of turns a new world minor civ remains a minor after the conditions under NewWorldPolicies 2 and higher are satisfied

TEXT.English: New World barbcivs will attack Old World civs preferentially and in addition to wars against other new world civs
TEXT.French: New World barbcivs will attack Old World civs preferentially and in addition to wars against other new world civs
TEXT.German: Die Barbaren-Zivilisationen der Neuen Welt greifen Zivilisationen der Alten Welt bevorzugt und zusätzlich zu Kriegen mit anderen Zivilisationen der Neuen Welt an
TEXT.Italian: New World barbcivs will attack Old World civs preferentially and in addition to wars against other new world civs
TEXT.Spanish: Las civilizaciones bárbaras del Nuevo Mundo atacaran a las del Viejo Mundo preferiblemente y además de las guerras que tuvieran con otras civilizaciones del Nuevo Mundo
TEXT.Finnish: New World barbcivs will attack Old World civs preferentially and in addition to wars against other new world civs

TEXT.English: Offer player control of new barb civilizations
TEXT.French: Offer player control of new barb civilizations
TEXT.German: Bietet dem Spieler die Kontrolle einer neuen Barbaren-Zivilisation an
TEXT.Italian: Offer player control of new barb civilizations
TEXT.Spanish: Ofrece al jugador tomar el control de las nuevas civilizaciones bárbaras
TEXT.Finnish: Offer player control of new barb civilizations

TEXT.English: Cancels player control of new barb civilizations
TEXT.French: Cancels player control of new barb civilizations
TEXT.German: Beendet die Kontrolle neuer Barbaren-Zivilisationen durch den Spieler
TEXT.Italian: Cancels player control of new barb civilizations
TEXT.Spanish: Cancela la toma de control de las nuevas civilizaciones bárbaras por el jugador
TEXT.Finnish: Cancels player control of new barb civilizations

TEXT.English: If a city has culture, spawn a new civ with same art style as highest culture player
TEXT.French: If a city has culture, spawn a new civ with same art style as highest culture player
TEXT.German: Wenn eine Barbarenstadt Kultur entwickelt, so ensteht eine neue Zivilisation mit dem Stil des Spielers mit der höchstem Kulturwert
TEXT.Italian: If a city has culture, spawn a new civ with same art style as highest culture player
TEXT.Spanish: Si una ciudad tiene cultura, genera una nueva civilización bárbaras con el mismo estilo artístico que el jugador con la cultura más elevada.
TEXT.Finnish: If a city has culture, spawn a new civ with same art style as highest culture player

TEXT.English: Barbcivs will not spawn if there are already this many civs in the game (-1 for DLL limit)
TEXT.French: Barbcivs will not spawn if there are already this many civs in the game (-1 for DLL limit)
TEXT.German: Barbaren-Zivilisationen entstehen nicht, wenn es bereits so viele Zivilisationen im Spiel gibt (-1 wegen der DLL-Begrenzung)
TEXT.Italian: Barbcivs will not spawn if there are already this many civs in the game (-1 for DLL limit)
TEXT.Spanish: Las Civ. Bárbaras no se asentaran si ya hay este número de civilizaciones en el juego (-1 del límite DLL)
TEXT.Finnish: Barbcivs will not spawn if there are already this many civs in the game (-1 for DLL limit)

TEXT.English: Change odds of barb city turning into a minor civ)
TEXT.French: Change odds of barb city turning into a minor civ
TEXT.German: Verändert die Wahrscheinlichkeit, mit der Barbarenstädte sich in kleine Zivilisationen umwandeln
TEXT.Italian: Change odds of barb city turning into a minor civ
TEXT.Spanish: Cambia las probabilidades de que una ciudad bárbara se convierta en Civ. Menor.
TEXT.Finnish: Change odds of barb city turning into a minor civ

TEXT.English: Minimum population needed for a barb city to settle
TEXT.French: Minimum population needed for a barb city to settle
TEXT.German: Minimale Bevölkerung, damit sich eine Barbarenstadt weiterentwickelt
TEXT.Italian: Minimum population needed for a barb city to settle
TEXT.Spanish: Mínimo de población necesario para una ciudad bárbara se asiente.
TEXT.Finnish: Minimum population needed for a barb city to settle

TEXT.English: Minimum number of contacts (with any civ) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ
TEXT.French: Minimum number of contacts (with any civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ
TEXT.German: Mindestzahl an Kontakten (mit beliebigen Zivilisationen), die eine Barbaren-Zivilisation benötigt, um eine vollwertige Zivilisation zu werden
TEXT.Italian: Minimum number of contacts (with any civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ
TEXT.Spanish: Número mínimo de contactos (con cualquier Civ.) que una Civilización Bárbara menor necesita para convertirse en una Civilización Completa.
TEXT.Finnish: Minimum number of contacts (with any civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ

TEXT.English: Minimum number of contacts (with full civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ
TEXT.French: Minimum number of contacts (with full civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ
TEXT.German: Mindestzahl an Kontakten (mit vollwertigen Zivilisationen), die eine Barbaren-Zivilisation benötigt, um selbst eine vollwertige Zivilisation zu werden
TEXT.Italian: Minimum number of contacts (with full civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ
TEXT.Spanish: Número mínimo de contactos (con Civ. Completas) que una Civilización Bárbara menor necesita para convertirse en una Civilización Completa.
TEXT.Finnish: Minimum number of contacts (with full civs) a Barbarian Civ needs to settle from a minor to full civ

TEXT.English: Base odds of Military style buildup
TEXT.French: Base odds of Military style buildup
TEXT.German: Grundlegende Wahrscheinlichkeit für militärisch ausgerichtete Barbaren-Zivilisation
TEXT.Italian: Base odds of Military style buildup
TEXT.Spanish: Probabilidades base del estilo 'Incremento en la Fuerza Militar'
TEXT.Finnish: Base odds of Military style buildup

TEXT.English: Former barbarians get all techs known by this fraction of players
TEXT.French: Former barbarians get all techs known by this fraction of players
TEXT.German: Ehemalige Barbaren erhalten alle Technologien, die dieser Anteil der Spieler kennt
TEXT.Italian: Former barbarians get all techs known by this fraction of players
TEXT.Spanish: Las nuevas civilizaciones bárbaras obtienen todas las tecnologías conocidas por este número de jugadores
TEXT.Finnish: Former barbarians get all techs known by this fraction of players

TEXT.English: Reduce tech given to former barbarians alone on a continent (larger means they're more behind)
TEXT.French: Reduce tech given to former barbarians alone on a continent (larger means they're more behind)
TEXT.German: Reduziere die Zahl der Technologien, die ehemalige Barbaren erhalten, die sich allein auf dem Kontinent befinden (größere Zahlen bedeuten, sie liegen weiter zurück)
TEXT.Italian: Reduce tech given to former barbarians alone on a continent (larger means they're more behind)
TEXT.Spanish: Reduce las tecnologías obtenidas por las nuevas civilizaciones bárbaras que estén solas en un continente (Valor elevado significa que obtienen menos tecnologías)
TEXT.Finnish: Reduce tech given to former barbarians alone on a continent (larger means they're more behind)

TEXT.English: Eras behind New World BarbCivs will be targeted for in spawning tech grant
TEXT.French: Eras behind New World BarbCivs will be targeted for in spawning tech grant
TEXT.German: Barbaren-Zivilisation in der Neuen Welt, die in der Forschung um Zeitalter zurückliegen, werden für die Zuteilung von Technologien ausgewählt
TEXT.Italian: Eras behind New World BarbCivs will be targeted for in spawning tech grant
TEXT.Spanish: Atraso que las nuevas civilizaciones bárbaras sufrirán cuando reciban las tecnologías al asentarse.
TEXT.Finnish: Eras behind New World BarbCivs will be targeted for in spawning tech grant

TEXT.English: Number of bonus techs that builder type BarbCivs get
TEXT.French: Number of bonus techs that builder type BarbCivs get
TEXT.German: Anzahl von Bonustechnologien, die aufbauorientierte Barbaren-Zivilisation ("Builder") erhalten
TEXT.Italian: Number of bonus techs that builder type BarbCivs get
TEXT.Spanish: Numero de tecnologías de bonus que obtienen las civilizaciones bárbaras de tipo Diligente.
TEXT.Finnish: Number of bonus techs that builder type BarbCivs get

TEXT.English: After settling into a full civ from a minor, militaristic barb civ will declare war on the first civ it meets within this window of turns
TEXT.French: After settling into a full civ from a minor, militaristic barb civ will declare war on the first civ it meets within this window of turns
TEXT.German: Wenn aus einer kleinen Zivilisation eine vollwertige militaristische Barbaren-Zivilisation geworden ist, so wird sie innerhalb dieses Zeitfensters der ersten Zivilisation, auf die sie trifft, den Krieg erklären
TEXT.Italian: After settling into a full civ from a minor, militaristic barb civ will declare war on the first civ it meets within this window of turns
TEXT.Spanish: Después de asentarse como una civilización completa, las civilizaciones Agresivas declararan la guerra a la primera civilización que se encuentren dentro de esta ventana de turnos.
TEXT.Finnish: After settling into a full civ from a minor, militaristic barb civ will declare war on the first civ it meets within this window of turns

TEXT.English: Max Distance between capitals for barb civ to consider immeadiate declaration of war (must also be on same continent)
TEXT.French: Max Distance between capitals for barb civ to consider immeadiate declaration of war (must also be on same continent)
TEXT.German: Maximaler Abstand zwischen Hauptstädten, bei dem die Barbaren-Zivilisation eine unmittelbare Kriegserklärung in Betracht zieht (nur auf demselben Kontinent)
TEXT.Italian: Max Distance between capitals for barb civ to consider immeadiate declaration of war (must also be on same continent)
TEXT.Spanish: Máxima distancia entre capitales para que una civilización bárbara considere la declaración de guerra inmediata (Debe estar en el mismo continente).
TEXT.Finnish: Max Distance between capitals for barb civ to consider immeadiate declaration of war (must also be on same continent)

TEXT.English: Affects number of (non-defense) military units given to barbs
TEXT.French: Affects number of (non-defense) military units given to barbs
TEXT.German: Beeinflusst die Zahl von Einheiten (außer Verteidigungseinheiten), die die Barbaren erhalten
TEXT.Italian: Affects number of (non-defense) military units given to barbs
TEXT.Spanish: Afecta al número de (no defensivas) unidades militares otorgadas a los barbaros.
TEXT.Finnish: Affects number of (non-defense) military units given to barbs
